Argynte

Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

>First the King of Akanon is a Gnomish Enchanter. He usually has the human
>illusion spell active. Second, While I haven't yet obtained the staff of
>writhing, I do have its stats. Hmmm must be at home. Well I can't
remember
>damage/delay but the effect is "casts chaotic feedback". This is NOT the
staff
>of the Priest of Discord. He carries the Staff of Discord.
